meanings.definition: Swollen and inflamed veins in the rectum and anus.
meanings.sent1: She winced in pain due to her hemorrhoids.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a cream for her hemorrhoids.
meanings.sent3: Despite their funny name, hemorrhoids can be quite uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her hemorrhoids felt like little balloons ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The image of hemorrhoids made her cringe with discomfort.

meanings.definition: A painful condition caused by swollen veins in the lower part of the rectum or anus.
meanings.sent1: His hemorrhoids made sitting for long periods unbearable.
meanings.sent2: Many people suffer from hemorrhoids at some point in their lives.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the woes of hemorrhoids, making the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world seemed to rest on his hemorrhoids, causing him great discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The thought of hemorrhoids made her cringe with sympathy for those affected.
